_header: He that will be a lover in every wise
Subjects: lovers, advice to; women, as speakers/narrators
_description: Three essentials for love — one stanza rhyme royal

BLRoy18Avi.First Lines:
He that wilbe a lover in euery wiseHe muste haue thre thingis
                    whiche Ieame lackith…
BLRoy18Avi.Last Lines:
…Marke well this that lovers wil beMuste nedys have oone of
                    thes thre
